stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

ArrayList<Integer> nums = new ArrayList<Integer>();

nums.add(12);
nums.add(13);
nums.add(15);
nums.add(10);

if (nums.get(0) > nums.get(nums.size() - 1))
{ 
   int x = nums.get(0); 
   nums.set(0, nums.get(nums.size() - 1)); 
   nums.set(nums.size() - 1, x); 
}

choicesHtml: It compares all values in nums and places nums in order from smallest to largest.
It compares all values in nums and places nums in order from largest to smallest.
It compares the first and last elements in nums and swaps them if the first element is larger than the last.
It compares the first and last elements in nums and swaps them if the first element is smaller than the last.
